filmes.descricao: A police officer joins a secret organization that polices and monitors extraterrestrial interactions on Earth.
When the menace known as the Joker wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham, Batman must accept one of the greatest psychological and physical tests of his ability to fight injustice.
Diana must contend with a work colleague and businessman, whose desire for extreme wealth sends the world down a path of destruction, after an ancient artifact that grants wishes goes missing.

filmes.titulo: American Pie: A Primeira Vez é Inesquecível
filmes.descricao: Four teenage boys enter a pact to lose their virginity by prom night.

In Gotham City, mentally troubled comedian Arthur Fleck is disregarded and mistreated by society. He then embarks on a downward spiral of revolution and bloody crime. This path brings him face-to-face with his alter-ego: the Joker.

After the devastating events of Vingadores: Guerra Infinita (2018), the universe is in ruins. With the help of remaining allies, the Avengers assemble once more in order to reverse Thanos' actions and restore balance to the universe.
Political involvement in the Avengers' affairs causes a rift between Captain America and Iron Man.

Peter Parker balances his life as an ordinary high school student in Queens with his superhero alter-ego Spider-Man, and finds himself on the trail of a new menace prowling the skies of New York City.
A faded television actor and his stunt double strive to achieve fame and success in the final years of Hollywood's Golden Age in 1969 Los Angeles.

During the era of Prohibition in the United States, Federal Agent Eliot Ness sets out to stop ruthless Chicago gangster Al Capone and, because of rampant corruption, assembles a small, hand-picked team to help him.

filmes.titulo: Forrest Gump: O Contador de Histórias
filmes.descricao: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, the Vietnam War, the Watergate scandal and other historical events unfold from the perspective of an Alabama man with an IQ of 75, whose only desire is to be reunited with his childhood sweetheart.
When a beautiful stranger leads computer hacker Neo to a forbidding underworld, he discovers the shocking truth--the life he knows is the elaborate deception of an evil cyber-intelligence.
An insomniac office worker and a devil-may-care soapmaker form an underground fight club that evolves into something much, much more.
A former Roman General sets out to exact vengeance against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family and sent him into slavery.
A vampire tells his epic life story: love, betrayal, loneliness, and hunger.
